messages.simple_veinminer.restriction.to: You need a tool to veinmine
messages.simple_veinminer.restriction.sp: This is not the right tool for this block
messages.simple_veinminer.restriction.hu: You are too hungry to veinmine
config.simple_veinminer.maxBlocks: The maximum number of blocks that can be mined at once
config.simple_veinminer.durability.damag: How much damage a tool takes per block veinmined
config.simple_veinminer.durability.sword: If the tool is a sword, how much does that damage get multiplied by
config.simple_veinminer.durability.consu: Lose durability on blocks with 0 hardness
config.simple_veinminer.restrictions.can: Can veinmine without a tool (or sword)
config.simple_veinminer.restrictions.cre: Ignore restrictions when on creative mode
config.simple_veinminer.restrictions.can: Can only veinmine with the right tool
config.simple_veinminer.tooltip.suitable: Will only allow to veinmine wood using an axe,
dirt using a shovel, stone using a pickaxe, etc.
config.simple_veinminer.tooltip.toggleMo: Recommended: If you turn this on,
turn restriction messages off and highlights on
config.simple_veinminer.outline.outlineB: Outline blocks that wil be mined
